price: They did not forbid one another from committing evil deeds. Terrible was indeed what they used to do!
arabic: كَانُواْ لَا يَتَنَاهَوۡنَ عَن مُّنكَرٖ فَعَلُوهُۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
